Uses of Class
se.softhouse.jargo.Argument

  • Packages that use Argument 
    Package Description
    se.softhouse.jargo
    An argument and options parser for java

    • Uses of Argument in se.softhouse.jargo

      Methods in se.softhouse.jargo that return Argument 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Argument<T> ArgumentBuilder.build()
      Returns an Immutable Argument which can be passed to CommandLineParser.withArguments(Argument...)
      When the parsing is done the parsed value for this argument can be fetched with ParsedArguments.get(Argument).
      static Argument<?> Arguments.helpArgument(String mandatoryName, String... optionalNames)
      Makes the CommandLineParser it's passed to throw a helpful ArgumentException with usage explaining either the full program or a specific Argument/Command.
      Methods in se.softhouse.jargo that return types with arguments of type Argument 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<Argument<?>> Command.subCommands(Command... commands)
      Useful if your Command has subcommands that you'll want to pass into the Command.Command(List) constructor
      Methods in se.softhouse.jargo with parameters of type Argument 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.andArguments(Argument<?>... argumentsToAlsoSupport)
      Adds support for argumentsToAlsoSupport in this CommandLineParser.
      <T> T ParsedArguments.get(Argument<T> argumentToFetch)
      Returns the parsed value for the given argumentToFetch, if no value was given on the command line the default value is returned.
      boolean ParsedArguments.wasGiven(Argument<?> argument)
      Checks if an Argument was given in the command line arguments
      static CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.withArguments(Argument<?>... argumentDefinitions)
      Creates a CommandLineParser with support for the given argumentDefinitions.
      Method parameters in se.softhouse.jargo with type arguments of type Argument 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.withArguments(Iterable<Argument<?>> argumentDefinitions)
      Iterable version of CommandLineParser.withArguments(Argument...)
      Constructors in se.softhouse.jargo with parameters of type Argument 
      Constructor and Description
      Command(Argument<?>... commandArguments) 
      Constructor parameters in se.softhouse.jargo with type arguments of type Argument 
      Constructor and Description
      Command(List<Argument<?>> commandArguments)
